version_description:
1.Fixed Audiobus issue in iOS8
2.Minor bug fixed

1. Support iOS 11.
2. Optimized UI for iPhone X.
3. Bug Fixes.

Upgrade to Universal version.
Improved Yaozhi(Shake) sound effect.
New UI. New Icon.

1. One new playing technique of left hand - "Dian Yin (点音)" (Tap Pitch) , Tapping pitch slider after plucking string to make "Dian Yin" sound effect.
2. Smart snapping to the correct pitch grid when moving the pitch slider.
3. Impoved the effect of glissing on strings rapid
4. fixed bug of unexpected mute.

1.Follow-Play songs for learning Guzheng.
2.New UI.
3.Bug fixes.

1.Added Favorites List in Songs page.
2.Loop Play Mode.
3.Changes of Flower Technique Velocity: Only when you sliding strings from LEFT-BOTTOM to RIGHT-TOP (The curve path just likes "J"), that will trigger Automatical Velocity Changes for Flower Technique.
4.Added Locking Zooming Button. The Help Button has moved to Settings Page.
5.Fixed crashing issue on iOS 9.
5.Bug Fixes.
